column4: okay guys - i back - Im reading the log file - Im not in the same room though - drmopen fails, and xaainit (i believe) does too.. it does pick up my video card in the beginning (ati radeon xpress 200)
how can I set it to a generic vesa driver and try that way
in your xorg.conf / xfree86 file set driver = vesa
edit /etc/X11/xorg.conf under "Device"  change Driver "whaterver Prob ATI" to Driver "vesa"
